modName: Build Your Dragonborn (BYD) (A Batch file mod)
summary: I know that there are plenty of batch files that edit the the Dragonborn's skills and perks, but this mod aims to give the player plenty of choices via more and separate files.
descriptionHtml:
[font=Times New Roman][b][color=#6fa8dc][size=5]CHECK ME OUT ON THE SSE VERSION OF SKYRIM! 2 NEW MODS!
[/size][size=4]Although the new mods aren't supper spectacular, more so projects to get familiar and better witht he Creation Kit.[/size]

[size=4]-INTRO-[/size][/color][/b]
[/font][size=3]This is a mod that lets you choose what kind of Dragonborn hero that you want to be via batch file, and I choose to do this with different types of Dragonborn presets. I was inspired by all the other skill related batch files; however, I was a little disappointed that I couldn't find a non-overpowered file, so I decided to hand-type each individual batch file....it's a little time consuming, but I did copy and paste the entire list of perks, spell tomes, and armor/weapon sets as typing each one would be hell, but the skills, Magicka, Health, and Stamina were all hand typed per file.[/size]

[size=4][color=#6fa8dc]-NOTE-[/color]
[/size][size=3]I will take request for certain mods; however, until I can look at the mod and get the IDs for the items, there will be no estimated planned upload date. If you have questions, feel free to ask. If you want to report a bug, please do so.[/size]

[color=#6fa8dc][size=4][b]-HOW TO INSTALL-[/b][/size][/color]
[size=3]Download the file you want manually, then place it in Steam/Common/Skyrim/Data
All done.[/size]

[color=#6fa8dc][size=4][b]-HOW TO UNINSTALL-[/b][/size][/color]
[size=3]Find the name of the file that you want to delete, then just delete it, simple.
All done.
(You can install the file, then activate it in game, then close Skyrim and delete the file
if you don't want it to take up any space on your computer, and all the effects should remain.
Let me know if this is not true and I will try and fix it.)[/size]

[size=4][b][color=#6fa8dc]-HOW TO ACTIVATE-[/color][/b]
[/size][size=3]When in game, press `~ (known as the Tilde key) and type the name of the bat file and and db at the end.
(I.E if you want the nobody pack, you would type [b][u]bat nobodydb[/u][/b] if you wanted the adept pack, you would type [u][b]bat adeptdb[/b][/u] and if you wanted the god pack, you would type [u][b]bat goddb[/b][/u] )
Bat nobodydb[/size]

[color=#6fa8dc][size=4][b]-PLANNED CHANGES/UPDATES-[/b][/size][/color]
[size=3]TBD 2017? - DLC Spells for each catagory. (It will be labeld (MasterMageDLCDB))
it will have 3 folders, one for each DLC and the 2 in one. Dawnguard, Dragonborn, and Complete.
(POSTPONED UNTIL 30th of April)(Maybe Before)

TBD 2017? - Adding DLC Armors and weapons. (POSTPONED UNTIL 30th of April)(Maybe Before)

TBD 2017? - Several optional files that contain all different types of armor and weapons for the 
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26983/?]Crusaders Knights Templar Hospitaller Teutonic Medieval Armors[/url] mod. (MAY HAVE AN EARLIER RELEASE DATE)
[/size]
[color=#6fa8dc][size=4][b]-CURRENT VERSION LOG-[/b][/size][/color]
[size=3]4/13/2016 - V 1.0 UPLOADED (READ -CHANGE LOG- AND -YOUR DRAGONBORN-)[/size]

[color=#6fa8dc][size=4][b]-CHANGE LOG-[/b][/size][/color]
[size=3]4/13/2016 - NONE[/size]

[size=3]4/14/2016 - Added MasterMageDB file. this contains all the spells in their categories.[/size]
[size=3]This does not include the DLC spells...yet.[/size]

[size=3]4/14/2016 - Added WeaponDB, a folder that contains batch files for every weapon material type[/size]
[size=3]with every weapon type, including arrows.[/size]

[size=3]4/14/2016 - Added ArmorDb, a folder that contains batch files for every armor for every material type (I.E. Ebony, Daedric, ETC)

4/14/2016 - UPDATED FILE: Fixed ArmorDB/Dragonplatearmordb.txt missing item add amount.[/size]

[b][color=#6fa8dc][size=4]-COMPATIBILITY-
[/size][/color][/b][size=3]This mod is compatible with most mods on the nexus, but I would avoid using this if you use Perkus Maximus, or any other mod that adds perks to the game. I would also advise against using any mod that acts like mine, as it may conflict, but not likely. If you find a mod in particular that you have issues with, be sure to notify me so I can place it on an incompatibility list.[/size]

[color=#6fa8dc][size=4]-RECOMENDED MODS-
[/size][/color][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26983/?]Crusaders Knights Templar Hospitaller Teutonic Medieval Armors[/url] by: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2244264/?]ghostrecon123[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34155/?]Dual Sheath Redux[/url] by: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/1267569/?]Neovalen[/url]
(MORE TO COME)

[b][color=#6fa8dc][size=4]-AUTHER NOTES-
[/size][/color][/b][size=3][color=#741b47][b]8/29/2017 11:16 A.M. -[/b][/color] For those of you who still read this, sorry for the lack of fullfilling the planned updates, life hit and it hit hard. I've been trying to get everything sorted for well over a year. I plan on finishing 3 or maybe more updates for the Legendary Edition of Skyrim, but I'm also going to be moving and testing these new files on the Special Edition of Skyrim as well as work on some updates for the SE. I say again, I'm sorry, I really wanted to keep updating this file, but I couldn't find the time. I'll have an update before the 5th of September. (Probably on the 30th of August or 1st of September.)[/size]

[size=4][b][color=#6fa8dc]-TYPES DRAGONBORN-[/color][/b]
[/size][size=3]There are several types of Dragonborn heroes that you can be, and the choice is up to you. (NOTE: The difficulty system that I placed is based upon the idea that you have your game set to Adept (Normal) and are not using any other commands/mods to make the game easy)[/size]
 
[size=3][color=#fff2cc][b]Nobody[/b] - For players who want their hero to be new to everything. (DIFFICULTY: IMPOSSIBLE)[/color]
All Skills are set to 0
No perks
Magicka, Health, and Stamina are set to 50
Carryweight set to 100
No Gold
No lockpicks
Footwraps
Ragged Trousers
Roughspun Tunic 
Shiv
[color=#ffe599][b]Novice[/b] - For players who want their hero to have minor experience. (DIFFICULTY: VERY HARD)
[/color]All skills are set to 20
No perks
Magicka, Health, and Stamina are set to 100
Carryweight set to 150
100 Gold
10 Lockpicks
Full set of Hide Armor and an Iron Dagger
[color=#ffd966][b]Apprentice[/b] - For players who want their hero to have some experience. (DIFFICULTY: HARD[/color][color=#ffd966])
[/color]All skills are set to 30
No perks
Magicka, Health, and Stamina are set to 120
Carryweight set to 200
500 Gold
25 Lockpicks
Full set of Iron armor
[color=#f1c232][b]Adept[/b] - For players who want their hero to be experienced, but still learning. (DIFFICULTY: SEMI-HARD)[/color]
All skills are set to 40
No perks
Magicka, Health, and Stamina are set to 140
Carryweight set to 250
1,000 Gold
50 Lockpicks
Full set of Steel armor
[color=#e69138][b]Expert[/b] - For players who want their hero to know how to survive in Skyrim, but not a master of it. (DIFFICULTY: MEDIUM)[/color]
All skills are set to 60
No perks
Magicka, Health, and Stamina are set to 200
Carryweight set to 300
5,000 Gold
75 Lockpicks
Full set of Dwarven armor
[color=#ff7700][b]Master[/b] - For players who want their hero to be a master of Skyrim, but not a legend. (DIFFICULTY: EASY)[/color]
All skills are set to 80
All perks
Magicka, Health, and Stamina are set to 300
Carryweight set to 400
10,000 Gold
100 Lockpicks
Full set of Orcish armor
[color=#b45f06][b]Legendary[/b] - For players who want their hero to be a legend of Skyrim. (DIFFICULTY: VERY EASY)[/color]
All skills are set to 100
All perks
Magicka, Health, and Stamina are set to 500
Carryweight set to 500
100,000 Gold
200 Lockpicks
Full set of Ebony armor
[color=#980000][b]Demi-God[/b] - For players who want their hero to have nearly ascended to godhood. (DIFFICULTY: MINOR)[/color]
All skills are set to 500
All perks
Magicka, Health, and Stamina are set to 1,000
Carryweight set to 1,000
1,000,000 Gold
500 Lockpicks
Full set of Daedric Armor
[color=#660000][b]Godly[/b] - For players who want their hero to have ascended into godhood. (DIFFICULTY: NO CHALLENGE)
[/color]All skills are set to 1,000
All perks
Magicka, Health, and Stamina are set to 10,000
Carryweight set to 10,000
1,000,000,000 Gold
1,000 Lockpicks
Full set of Dragon Plate armor[/size]
author: ALCAPONE8642
